sentence.Network_en: He was conscious of colouring, and was annoyed at his boyishness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他感到一阵脸红, 觉得自己太幼稚因而很烦恼.

sentence.Network_en: What aroused her to something more than liking was his boyishness when they went tramping.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一起漫游时,他无意中表现出来的稚气竟使她心中更加激动不已.
